article_title: Japan to Double Indonesia, Philippines Currency Swap Lines
article_text:
TOKYO—Japan will strengthen its commitment to defending East Asian economies from financial shocks by building firmer firewalls using currency swaps, just as competition intensifies between Tokyo and Beijing for influence over one of the world's key growth regions.

Using its $1.275-trillion foreign currency reserves, the world's second largest after China's, Japan has for years been helping Asia make itself more resilient against the...
